name: Keen Eye
text:
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [intellect] until the end of the phase.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [combat] until the end of the phase.
real_text:
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [intellect] until the end of the phase.
[free] Spend 2 resources: You get +1 [combat] until the end of the phase.

name: Radiant Smite
text: Fight. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. When you initiate this attack, search the chaos bag for up to 3 [bless] tokens, and seal them here. For each [bless] token sealed on Radiant Smite, you get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats the attacked enemy, return the sealed tokens to the token pool. Otherwise, release them.
real_text: Fight. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. When you initiate this attack, search the chaos bag for up to 3 [bless] tokens, and seal them here. For each [bless] token sealed on Radiant Smite, you get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats the attacked enemy, return the sealed tokens to the token pool. Otherwise, release them.

name: The Truth Beckons
text: Play only if you are not engaged with an enemy. Move. Choose an unrevealed location. Move (one location at a time) along the shortest path toward that location, until you enter that location. End this effect if you reveal a location, if an enemy engages you, or if your movement is blocked.
real_text: Play only if you are not engaged with an enemy. Move. Choose an unrevealed location. Move (one location at a time) along the shortest path toward that location, until you enter that location. End this effect if you reveal a location, if an enemy engages you, or if your movement is blocked.

name: Gaze of Ouraxsh
text: Reveal 7 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. Deal a total of 1 damage plus 1 additional damage for each [curse] or [auto_fail] token revealed, divided as you choose among enemies at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
real_text: Reveal 7 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. Deal a total of 1 damage plus 1 additional damage for each [curse] or [auto_fail] token revealed, divided as you choose among enemies at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Priest of Two Faiths
text: [reaction] After Priest of Two Faiths enters play: Add 3 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag or discard Priest of Two Faiths.
real_text: [reaction] After Priest of Two Faiths enters play: Add 3 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag or discard Priest of Two Faiths.

name: Under Surveillance
text: Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Forced - After a non-[[Elite]] enemy enters attached location, discard Under Surveillance: Automatically evade that enemy and discover 1 clue at attached location. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.
real_text: Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Forced - After a non-[[Elite]] enemy enters attached location, discard Under Surveillance: Automatically evade that enemy and discover 1 clue at attached location. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Blood Pact
text:
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 [willpower] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
real_text:
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 [willpower] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Abyssal Tome
text: [action] Exhaust Abyssal Tome: Fight. You may use either [intellect] or [willpower] for this attack, instead of [combat]. When you initiate this attack, you may place 1 doom on Abyssal Tome (to a maximum of 3). You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack for each doom on Abyssal Tome.
real_text: [action] Exhaust Abyssal Tome: Fight. You may use either [intellect] or [willpower] for this attack, instead of [combat]. When you initiate this attack, you may place 1 doom on Abyssal Tome (to a maximum of 3). You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack for each doom on Abyssal Tome.

name: Butterfly Effect
text: Fast. Play when a chaos token with a symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location (before resolving its effects). You or the performing investigator may either commit a card to this skill test, or return a card they committed to this test to their hand.
real_text: Fast. Play when a chaos token with a symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location (before resolving its effects). You or the performing investigator may either commit a card to this skill test, or return a card they committed to this test to their hand.

name: Third Time's a Charm
text:
Fast. Play when a skill test at your location begins.
Twice during this test, when an investigator reveals a chaos token, they may cancel it, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new chaos token.
real_text:
Fast. Play when a skill test at your location begins.
Twice during this test, when an investigator reveals a chaos token, they may cancel it, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new chaos token.

name: Manipulate Destiny
text:
Reveal tokens from the chaos bag until you reveal a [curse], [auto_fail], [bless], or [elder_sign] token. If you revealed...
- ...a [curse] or [auto_fail] token, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.
- ...a [bless] or [elder_sign] token, heal 2 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
real_text:
Reveal tokens from the chaos bag until you reveal a [curse], [auto_fail], [bless], or [elder_sign] token. If you revealed...
- ...a [curse] or [auto_fail] token, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.
- ...a [bless] or [elder_sign] token, heal 2 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Devil Reef
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of keys the investigators control.
[cultist]: -2. If you fail and this is an attack or evasion attempt against a [[Deep One]] enemy, it engages you. (If it is already engaged with you, it disengages first, then re-engages you.)
[tablet]: -3. If you fail and you are not in a vehicle, take 1 damage.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail and your location has a key on it, take 1 horror.
real_text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of keys the investigators control.
[cultist]: -2. If you fail and this is an attack or evasion attempt against a [[Deep One]] enemy, it engages you. (If it is already engaged with you, it disengages first, then re-engages you.)
[tablet]: -3. If you fail and you are not in a vehicle, take 1 damage.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail and your location has a key on it, take 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the number of keys the investigators control.
[cultist]: -3. If this is an attack or evasion attempt against a [[Deep One]] enemy, it engages you. (If it is already engaged with you, it disengages first, then re-engages you.)
[tablet]: -4. If you are not in a vehicle, take 1 damage.
[elder_thing]: -5. If your location has a key on it, take 1 horror.

name: Secrets of the Sea (v. I)
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
real_text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
flavor: The sailors along the docks of Innsmouth eye you with suspicion as you depart. The lighthouse beacon at the top of the nearby cliffside provides your only illumination as you head deeper into the fog.

linked_card.name: The Terror of Devil Reef
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Fishing Vessel's location.

Hunter. Massive. Retaliate.

The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter Cave locations.

The Terror of Devil Reef gets +3 health.
linked_card.real_text: Spawn - Fishing Vessel's location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter [[Cave]] locations. The Terror of Devil Reef gets +3 [per_investigator] health.
linked_card.flavor: "It's got us in its grip! It ain't goin' nowhere. Now's your chance!"

name: Secrets of the Sea (v. II)
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
real_text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
flavor: The sailors along the docks of Innsmouth eye you with suspicion as you depart. The lighthouse beacon at the top of the nearby cliffside provides your only illumination as you head deeper into the fog.

linked_card.name: The Terror of Devil Reef
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Fishing Vessel's location.

Hunter. Massive. Retaliate.

The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter Cave locations.

Forced - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round (including the upkeep phase).
linked_card.real_text: Spawn - Fishing Vessel's location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter [[Cave]] locations. Forced - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round (including the upkeep phase).

name: The Devil of the Depths
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
real_text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
flavor: Now you know why none dare venture near the black reefs. It's not just the strange sightings on the islands - there is something far older and more horrifying that dwells under the waves...
back_text: Record in your Campaign Log the tide has grown stronger. (→R1)
back_flavor:
"We've gotta pull back!" Mr. Moore shouts over the roar of the waves. "The sea's too rough, and the tide's gettin' worse by the minute! Stay out here any longer an' we'll capsize fer sure!"
You protest, but the captain is right. The weather has gotten so bad Mr. Moore can barely control the ship. Worse yet, in just a matter of hours the tide has begun to swallow the coastal islands, leaving little for you to investigate. You nod to the captain, frustrated. This will have to do for now.

name: Reef of Mysteries
text: Keys can only be claimed from [[Y'ha-nthlei]] locations using the [free] ability on those locations. Objective - Find and claim as many of the following keys as you can from [[Y'ha-nthlei]] locations (purple, white, and black). If you control all 3 of these keys, advance.
real_text: Keys can only be claimed from [[Y'ha-nthlei]] locations using the [free] ability on those locations. Objective - Find and claim as many of the following keys as you can from [[Y'ha-nthlei]] locations (purple, white, and black). If you control all 3 of these keys, advance.
flavor: Somewhere in these accursed reefs, the Esoteric Order of Dagon is hiding something big... but what?
back_flavor: Confident that you've found enough evidence of the Order's activities, you head back to the coast. You'd much rather continue your investigation on dry land.

name: Churning Waters
text: [action] If you are in the Fishing Vessel: Resign. Each investigator in the Fishing Vessel resigns. Remove Fishing Vessel from the game. Each resigning investigator places each of their purple, black, or white keys on the current act. All other investigators are left to fend for themselves.
real_text: [action] If you are in the Fishing Vessel: Resign. Each investigator in the Fishing Vessel resigns. Remove Fishing Vessel from the game. Each resigning investigator places each of their purple, black, or white keys on the current act. All other investigators are left to fend for themselves.
back_text: Churning Waters enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).
back_flavor: "And far out at sea, despite a high tide, I glimpsed a long, black line scarcely rising above the water yet carrying a suggestion of odd latent malignancy." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: Lonely Isle
text: Forced - After Lonely Isle is revealed: Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Lonely Isle (but not to one another).
real_text: Forced - After Lonely Isle is revealed: Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Lonely Isle (but not to one another).
back_flavor: "...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: Hidden Cove
text: Forced - After you reveal Hidden Cove: Put 1 set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Hidden Cove, then put 1 set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to that Tidal Tunnel.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal Hidden Cove: Put 1 set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Hidden Cove, then put 1 set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to that Tidal Tunnel.
back_flavor: "...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: Waveworn Island
text: Forced - After you reveal Waveworn Island: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths and 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Waveworn Island (but not to one another).
real_text: Forced - After you reveal Waveworn Island: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths and 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Waveworn Island (but not to one another).
back_flavor:
"...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality."
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: Salt Marshes
text: [action] If you control the purple key: Look at the revealed side of any Tidal Tunnels or Unfathomable Depths location in play. (Group limit once per game.) Forced - After you reveal Salt Marshes: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Salt Marshes.

name: Black Reef
text: Forced - After you reveal Black Reef: Increase its flood level. Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Black Reef (but not to one another). Then, put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to both of those Tidal Tunnels.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal Black Reef: Increase its flood level. Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Black Reef (but not to one another). Then, put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to both of those Tidal Tunnels.
back_flavor:

name: Bootlegger's Hideaway
text: Forced - After Bootlegger's Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger's Hideaway without looking at it. [action] If you control the white key: Draw 3 cards. (Group limit once per game.)
real_text: Forced - After Bootlegger's Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger's Hideaway without looking at it. [action] If you control the white key: Draw 3 cards. (Group limit once per game.)
back_flavor: The air is frigid here, and there is no sound but the faint plinking of water dripping onto the rough stone ground. You shudder and proceed onward...

name: Bootlegger's Hideaway
text: Forced - After Bootlegger's Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger's Hideaway without looking at it. [action] If you control the black key: Gain 5 resources. (Group limit once per game.)
real_text: Forced - After Bootlegger's Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger's Hideaway without looking at it. [action] If you control the black key: Gain 5 resources. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Deep One Grotto
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: Increase its flood level. Place the set-aside purple key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the red key and the blue key and spend 2 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the purple key and read Flashback IX in the Campaign Guide.
real_text: Forced - After this location is revealed: Increase its flood level. Place the set-aside purple key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the red key and the blue key and spend 2 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the purple key and read Flashback IX in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor:
"They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar."
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: Fishing Vessel
text:
Vehicle.
While you are in this vehicle, treat your location as if it were unflooded.
[action]: Move Fishing Vessel to a connecting [[Ocean]] location.
real_text:
Vehicle.
While you are in this vehicle, treat your location as if it were unflooded.
[action]: Move Fishing Vessel to a connecting [[Ocean]] location.

name: Waveworn Idol
text: [reaction] After your location's flood level changes, or after a [[Deep One]] enemy spawns at your location, exhaust Waveworn Idol: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).
real_text: [reaction] After your location's flood level changes, or after a [[Deep One]] enemy spawns at your location, exhaust Waveworn Idol: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).

name: Awakened Mantle
text: [free] If your location is flooded, exhaust Awakened Mantle: Move to a connecting location that is also flooded.
real_text: [free] If your location is flooded, exhaust Awakened Mantle: Move to a connecting location that is also flooded.

name: Headdress of Y'ha-nthlei
text: You get +1 skill value while investigating a flooded location or while attacking or evading an enemy at a flooded location.
real_text: You get +1 skill value while investigating a flooded location or while attacking or evading an enemy at a flooded location.

name: Deep One Predator
text: Hunter. Forced - After Deep One Predator engages you: Move 1 of your clues or keys to Deep One Predator. Forced - When you defeat or evade Deep One Predator: Take control of all of its clues and keys.
real_text: Hunter. Forced - After Deep One Predator engages you: Move 1 of your clues or keys to Deep One Predator. Forced - When you defeat or evade Deep One Predator: Take control of all of its clues and keys.

name: Hunting Deep One
text: Hunter. While Hunting Deep One is engaged with you, you cannot enter vehicles or gain resources. Forced - After Hunting Deep One engages you: If you are not in a vehicle, lose 2 resources. If you are in a vehicle, leave your vehicle.
real_text: Hunter. While Hunting Deep One is engaged with you, you cannot enter vehicles or gain resources. Forced - After Hunting Deep One engages you: If you are not in a vehicle, lose 2 resources. If you are in a vehicle, leave your vehicle.

name: Shapes in the Water
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). If you fail, take 2 horror. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). If you fail, take 2 horror. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

name: Aquatic Ambush
text: Revelation - Put Aquatic Ambush into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - When you reveal a chaos token while attacking an enemy at a flooded location: Reveal an additional chaos token. (Max once per test.) Forced - At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Aquatic Ambush from play. (Max once per round.)
real_text: Revelation - Put Aquatic Ambush into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - When you reveal a chaos token while attacking an enemy at a flooded location: Reveal an additional chaos token. (Max once per test.) Forced - At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Aquatic Ambush from play. (Max once per round.)

name: Horrors from the Deep
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). If you fail, take 2 damage. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).
real_text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). If you fail, take 2 damage. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

name: Stowaway
text: Revelation - If no investigators are in a vehicle, Stowaway gains surge. Otherwise, each investigator in a vehicle must either take 1 damage and 1 horror or leave that vehicle. Each investigator who left a vehicle cannot enter that vehicle for the remainder of the round.
real_text: Revelation - If no investigators are in a vehicle, Stowaway gains surge. Otherwise, each investigator in a vehicle must either take 1 damage and 1 horror or leave that vehicle. Each investigator who left a vehicle cannot enter that vehicle for the remainder of the round.

name: Dragged Under
text: Revelation - Put Dragged Under into play in your threat area. If you are in a vehicle, leave it. You cannot enter vehicles. [action]: Test [combat] (3) or [agility] (3). If you succeed, discard Dragged Under.
real_text: Revelation - Put Dragged Under into play in your threat area. If you are in a vehicle, leave it. You cannot enter vehicles. [action]: Test [combat] (3) or [agility] (3). If you succeed, discard Dragged Under.
